meanings.sent1: The sunset had an orangey glow that lit up the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a bright orangey color that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The orangey walls of the room made it feel warm and inviting.
meanings.sent4: The artist used an orangey palette to create a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: The pumpkin had an orangey hue that made it perfect for Halloween decorations.

meanings.definition: Having a taste or smell reminiscent of oranges.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a delicious orangey flavor that everyone loved.
meanings.sent2: The air was filled with the orangey scent of freshly squeezed oranges.
meanings.sent3: She sprayed an orangey perfume that reminded her of sunny days.
meanings.sent4: The tea had an orangey aroma that was both soothing and refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The candle emitted an orangey fragrance that filled the room with warmth.
